column4: how'd i find out which version of inotify is currently in the hoary kernel?
i hardly think that is going to work as it's just a kernel patch
that's included in the defaul ubuntu kernel

I'm not sure if someone is making images with an updated inotify but it does tend to change regularly.  You're better off compiling your own if you want to play with development level stuff like beagle ('tis not really ready for general use yet imho)
